item.title: II PU exam: 551 absentees in Yadgir and 1,140 in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[As the examination for II PU commenced on Saturday, 551 students did not appear for the Kannada language paper in Yadgir district, and 1,140 remained absent in Raichur district, according to officials.
As many as 8,627 students were allotted to write the examination in Yadgir district. Of which, 8,076 students appeared for the examination, while 551 students were absent.
In Raichur district, 17,574 were allotted, and of them, 16,434 wrote the examination.
The examination was conducted in a sm...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Four youths killed in two road accidents in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Four youths were killed on the spot in two different road accidents in Raichur city on Saturday.
In the first incident, three youths riding a motorcycle were killed after a speeding goods container rammed them, near Basaveshwar Circle.
The victims have been identified as Mohammad Ali Pasha, 24, Noor Mohammad, 19, and Fayaz, 26, and all were residents of Sukhani Colony in Raichur city.
The police sources said that the goods container was driven by Sahajor Azad Khan, a native of Ismailpur villa...]]>
